S01kathinau:4_1: athāyuṣmān mahākāśyapo jānann eva parārthaṃ bhagavantam evam āha /
S01kathinau:4_3: bhagavān āha / kārttikakṛṣṇapratipadam ārabhya triṃśad divaseṣu yad ahorātraṃ tatra saṃghasya kaṭhinam utpadyate /
S01kathinau:5_2: kṛtakalpadaśārañjanā nīlasūtrasūcīśāstrakalpena tad dānapatayaḥ saṃnipatite saṃghe niḥsārāpayitavyāḥ /
S01kathinau:5_3: karmakārakeṇa bhikṣuṇā tato dānapatayo dānaparikarmakathayā pratisaṃmodayitavyāḥ /
S01kathinau:6_1: tat sādhivāsetyādi / kaṭhinapradānaṃ kartukāmena dānapatinā 'ṣāḍhe śrāvaṇe vā māse savinayam upagamya kalpikakārakasya mukhenāryasaṃghasya vijñaptiḥ karaṇīyā tena caivaṃ karaṇīyā /
S01kathinau:6_3: yadite 'ṅgīkaroty āryasaṃgho no cen nivārayatv iti /
S01kathinau:6_4: so pi tadā yadi dānapater āśayo viśuddhaḥ suviśuddhaṃ ca deyavastu syāt tadā tūṣṇībhāvena svīkuryān no cen nivārayet /
S01kathinau:6_5: yadi tadādhivāsayaty āryasaṃghas tadā supramāṇāṃ surūpāṃ yugalīṃ rañjayitvā 'sya darśayet /
S01kathinau:6_6: tataḥ kalpikakārakas tām ādāya dānapatiṃ visṛjya hastena māpayitvānayā kaṭhinacīvaraṃ kariṣyati /
S01kathinau:6_8: dvividhaṃ hi kaṭhinaṃ cīvaraṃ kṛtam akṛtakaṃ ca /
S01kathinau:6_9: tatra nikāyabhedena trikhaṇḍapañcakhaṇḍādikaṃ pariṇāhenānyūna trihastam āyāmenānyūna pañcahastaṃ susīvitaṃ kṛtakaṃ /
S01kathinau:6_11: tat punaḥ pratyekaṃ dvividhaṃ niṣṭhitam aniṣṭḥitaṃ ca /
S01kathinau:6_14: . ..]ṇayā kālpikakārakaḥ / siddhaṃ kaṭhinacīvaram ādāyādhiṣṭhita traimāsasyāryasaṃghasya purastād evaṃ vadet /
S01kathinau:6_15: samanvāharāryyānena cīvareṇāsmiṃ saṃghāvāse 'mūkanāmā dānapatiḥ kaṭhinam āstariṣyati /
S01kathinau:6_17: evaṃ dvir api trir api tad anv āryasaṃgho pi tad adhyeṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya divā[.
S01kathinau:6_18: . .. ..]vā masīdravādinā nīlarāgarasena vā prānte catur bindūṃś catusatyādi viśuddhyā datvā trin vā triratnādi viśuddhyā dvau vā yogasaṃbhārādi viśuddhyā yathā vidhānam adhi(nu?)[.
S01kathinau:7_0: prabhātāyān tu nisāyāṃ parikalpitesūpasṛṣṭe samucchritātapatradhvajapatākā digvidig vinyastakhaṇḍapiṇḍadhūpaghaṭikojjvalayaṣṭipradīpasugandhagandhādidivyasurabhikusumāvakīrṇe pradeśe khaṭvāyām mañcāyām vā pṛthupīṭhake mantrādhiṣṭhitaṃ pañcabhir upahārair abhyarcitaṃ kaṭhinacīvaraṃ prasārya pratiṣṭhāpayet /
S01kathinau:7_1: tad anu tac chrāddho dānapatir udārābhiḥ pūjābhir abhipūjyābhipraṇamya suvarṇarajatatāmrādidhātu dravyaṃ marakatapadmarāgavajravaidūryyendranīlādikaṃ ratnaṃ divyāmbarābharaṇādikaṃ ca tasmin kaṭhinacīvare ratnatrayāya dadyāt /
S01kathinau:7_2: / kṣetraṃ vādikā gṛhārāmopavanādikaṃ dāsīdāsahastyaś ca gomahiṣyādikaṃ piṇḍakādipratyāyaṃ ca bahirdhanantāḍapatrādau tan nāmākam vilikhya tatraiva prayacchet /
S01kathinau:7_3: bhakṣyabhojyalehyapeyādikaṃ bhājanādīni pañcopakaraṇabhāṇḍāni śayanāsanādīni bhaiṣajyāny upakaraṇāni cānekāny upabhogārhāṇi vastūni kaṭhinaṃ saṃspṛśya tat pārśvataḥ saṃghopabhogāya viśrāṇayet /
S01kathinau:8_1: athāyuṣmān sumanā nāma bhikṣur bhagavantam etad avocat /
S01kathinau:8_2: / bhagavan kena kāraṇena cīvarādikaṃ kaṭhinam ity ucyate /
S01kathinau:8_3: bhagavān āha / āyuṣman dṛḍhaṃ viśuddham abhedyaṃ vipulāvināśi ca kaṭhinam ity ucyate /
S01kathinau:8_4: tathā hi dānapater āśayasya dṛḍhatvāc cīvarasya viśuddhatvāt saṃghasyābhedyatvād dānasya phalasya ca vipulāvināśitvāc ca sarvam eva kaṭhinaṃ bhavati /
S01kathinau:10_1: śrāvastyāṃ mahānagaryāṃ jetavane 'nāthapiṇḍadasyārāme śubhe surabhidhūpadhūpite sugandhipuṣpaprakaropaśobhite śuciparisare mahārham mahadāsana-m-āsīnaṃ viśuddhabodhiṃ vidhvastasamastadḥsaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ bhagavantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ śākyamunīndraṃ mahatpariṣadgaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ viharati sma /
S01kathinau:10_2: atha bhagavān tūṣṇībhāvenāvasthitaḥ san sattvārthaṃ prati daśavidhabuddhakṛtyakaraṇāya laukikaṃ cittam etc.
S01kathinau:11_1: tataḥ tīrthikaparivrājakacoditāyās tathāgataṃ prati duṣkṛtaṃ karma saṃsmṛtya saṃjātasaṃvegāḥ sthavirasthāvirā bhikṣavaḥ śirasi vinihitāñjalayo mahadāsanāsīnaṃ mahākāruṇikaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ praṇipatyedam abrūvan /
S01kathinau:12_1: kṛtā bhagavatānekā dharmādhikārikī kathā vyākṛtāś cāneke sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S01kathinau:13_1: tad anv anavatapte bhagavatḥ purastāt svakasvakāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākurmaḥ /
S01kathinau:14_1: dharmatā khalu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ jīvatāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatām daśāvaśyakaraṇīyāni bhavanti /
S01kathinau:14_2: / katamāni daśa / na tāvad buddhā bhagavantaḥ parinirvānti /
S01kathinau:14_4: yāvad anekena sattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati /
S01kathinau:14_5: yāvan na sarve vineyā vinītā bhavanti /
S01kathinau:14_6: yāvac chrāvakayugam agratāyāṃ na nirdiṣṭaṃ bhavati /
S01kathinau:14_8: yāvan nāyuṣaḥ pañcamo bhāga utsṛṣṭo bhavati /
S01kathinau:14_9: yāvan na śrāvastyām mahānagaryāṃ mahāprātihāryaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati /
S01kathinau:14_10: yāvan na śāṃkāśye nagare devāvatāram darśitaṃ bhavati /
S01kathinau:14_11: yāvan na mātāpitarau satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau bhavataḥ /
S01kathinau:14_12: yāvad anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikā karmaplotiḥ śrāvakasaṅghena sārdhaṃ na vyākṛtā bhavatīti /
S01kathinau:15_1: atha bhagavatā manasi kṛtvā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ vyākṛtā bhavatīti /
S01kathinau:15_2: bhagavan pūrvikāṃ karmaplotim anavatapte vyākartukāmo bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma /
S01kathinau:17_1: visphuradvicitramarīcijāla ekonaiḥ pañcabhir arhacchataiḥ sārdhaṃ lohitapakṣaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ parivṛto guratmān iva vihāyasā jetavanād vihārān
S01kathinau:19_1: atha bhagavān mahāśrāvakasaṃghena saha śrāvastyām antarhitaḥ himavaduttarasthagandhamādanaparvatasyottareṇa mahākīṭaparvatasyāgre
S01kathinau:20_2: tad anavataptaṃ mahāsaraḥ / tac ca / ekaikapārśvena catuścatvāriṃśad yojanāni /
S01kathinau:22_1: gaṅgā ca sindhuś ca nadaś ca vakṣuḥ
S01kathinau:22_2: śītā ca yān naiva taranti martyāḥ /
S01kathinau:29_1: atha tatra buddho bhagavāṃl laukikaṃ cittam utpādayati /
S01kathinau:30_0: tadāntaśaḥ kuntapipīlikādayo bhagavataś cetasā cittam ājānate /
S01kathinau:30_1: atha nandopanandau nāgarājāv evaṃ saṃlakṣayataḥ kiṃkāraṇaṃ bhagavatedaṃ cittam utpāditam anavatapte mahāsarasi karmaplotikāṃ vyākartukāma iti buddhādhiṣṭhānena jñātvā tābhyām anavatapte mahāsarasi madhye śakaṭacakrapramāṇaṃ sahasradalaṃ vilasanmaṇinālakaṃ suhīrakesaram pañcaratnamayaṃ bhagavata āsanārthaṃ sauvarṇasaroruhaṃ vinirmitaṃ tatra bhagavān niṣasāda bhikṣavo 'pi bhagavato 'bhisaṃmukham anyāsu kamalakarṇikāsu niṣaṇṇāḥ
S01kathinau:31_1: tena khalu punaḥ samayenāyuṣmāñ śāriputro gṛdhrakūṭe parvate saṃghāṭīṃ sivāyamānas tiṣṭhati /
S01kathinau:31_2: tatra bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate sma /
S01kathinau:31_4: evam bhagavann ity āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavato vacanam pratiśrutyānavatapte mahāsarasy antarhitaḥ /
S01kathinau:31_5: gṛdhrakūṭe parvate pratyasthād āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya purastād evaṃ cāha /
S01kathinau:31_6: he śāriputra śāstā ta ekonaiḥ pañcabhir arhacchataiḥ sārdham anavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāmas tvām udīkṣaṇaparas tiṣṭhati /
S01kathinau:31_7: āgacchatāṃ gacchāvaḥ / śāriputra āha / āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana saṃghāṭīṃ tāvat sīvyāmi paścād āgamiṣyāmi /
S01kathinau:31_8: tato maudgalyāyanena tad vacanam amṛṣyamāṇena rddhyā pañcāṅgulayo 'sya nibaddhāḥ /
S01kathinau:31_10: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana yady evaṃ saṃghāṭīsūtrā bhavatu /
S01kathinau:31_11: maudgalyāyanaḥ kathayati / āyuṣmañ chāriputra yadi na yāsyasi saṃghāṭī tāvat sīvayitavyaḥ /
S01kathinau:31_12: tataḥ paścād yāsyasi / āyuṣmañ chāriputra sāhāyyaṃ kalpayāmi /
S01kathinau:31_13: śāriputraḥ kathayati / evaṃ kuruṣva / athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svarddhyā pañcabhir aṅgulibhiḥ sīvayitum ārabhaḥ /
S01kathinau:31_15: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana yady evam anyasūtrā bhavatu /
S01kathinau:31_16: sa kathayati / āyuṣmañ śāriputraivaṃ kṛtvā yadi na yāsyasi /
S01kathinau:31_19: tvaṃ hy āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavata rddhimatāṃ madhye 'gro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S01kathinau:31_20: idaṃ tāvat prāg eva māṃ balena nayiṣyasi /
S01kathinau:31_23: maharddhiko mahānubhāvaḥ / sthānam etan nibadhyate yadākarṣiṣyate /
S01kathinau:31_26: gṛdhrakūṭaparvatasaha / āyuṣmāñ śāriputraḥ saṃlakṣayati gṛdhrakūṭaparvatam apy ayam ākarṣayiṣyati /
S01kathinau:31_31: yadā saṃkṣubdhā bhavanti tadā bhikṣavo buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti /
S01kathinau:31_34: bhagavān āha / na bhikṣavo nandopanandanāgarājau saṃkṣubhitāḥ /
S01kathinau:31_35: api ca mahāśrāvakayor anyonyaṃ mahad ṛddhiprakurvitaṃ /
S01kathinau:31_38: tena yasyāṃ padmakarṇikāyāṃ bhagavān niṣaṇṇas tasyāṃ padmanāla upanibaddhaḥ /
S01kathinau:31_39: tadā niṣkampo vyavasthitaḥ / āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanenāyuṣmāñ śāriputra uktaḥ /
S01kathinau:31_42: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyanaiko 'ham apy āgacchāmi yāvad āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano na gacchati /
S01kathinau:31_43: tadāyuṣmāñ śāriputraḥ prathamataraṃ gatvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā svāsanapadmakarṇikāyāṃ niṣaṇṇaḥ /
S01kathinau:31_44: tataḥ paścād āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āgataḥ svāsane ca vyavasthitaḥ /
S01kathinau:32_1: tataḥ sarve bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātā buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ paripṛcchanti /
S01kathinau:32_2: paśya bhadanta bhagavatāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano maharddhiko mahānubhāva ṛddhimatām madhye 'gro nirdiṣṭaḥ /
S01kathinau:32_4: bhagavān āha / na bhikṣava etarhy eva yathātīte 'py adhvany anena śilpenāpi parājitaḥ /
S01kathinau:33_1: tac chrūyatāṃ tāvat / bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo madhyadeśe citrakarācāryo 'bhūt /
S01kathinau:33_2: sa kenacit karaṇīyena yavanaviṣayaṃ gato yantrakarācāryasya niveśane 'vatīrṇas tatrāhārādikaṃ kṛtvā vyavasthitaḥ /
S01kathinau:33_4: sā ca dāruyantrapuṭṭalikā tailodvartanaṃ haste nidhāya sthāpayitā /
S01kathinau:33_5: tataḥ sā tenoktā / ihāgacchasveti / sā tūṣṇī vyavasthitā / sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ mama copasthānāya paricārikā preṣitā bhaviṣyatīti /
S01kathinau:33_6: varṇitā / aho vidhātrā nārīṇāṃ ratnasūtā vinirmitā /
S01kathinau:33_8: dhig aho tasya janma jambudvīpe manuṣyasya yasyedṛśī yuvatī rūpayauvanasampannā paramaramaṇīyā cakṣuṣā vā hastena vā śārīrasparśenādikaṃ [sic] na bhaved ity anenāmṛtasadṛśena mādhuryavacanena sambhāvitaḥ samāhartum ārabdhavān /
S01kathinau:33_10: tathāpi sā dāruyantrapuṭṭalikā na kiṃcid uktety avadhārya kāmopasaktacetasā satvaram upagamya /
S01kathinau:33_11: sā tena hastena gṛhītvākarṣitā tadā dārusaṃkalikānāṃ puñjo vyavasthitaḥ /
S01kathinau:33_12: sa bhinnopahāsaḥ kṛtaḥ / sa saṃlakṣayati / aham anenaikākī pratibheditaḥ /
S01kathinau:33_13: aham api tathā kariṣyāmi / yathāsau sarājikāyāṃ parṣanmadhye pratibhedopahāsaṃ gamiṣyatīti cintayitvā tena dvārābhimukha ātmodbaddhakaṇṭhakaś citritaḥ /
S01kathinau:33_18: sa tatra gataḥ / tena sa dṛṣṭaḥ / dṛṣṭvā ca saṃlakṣayati / kiṃkāraṇam anenātmodbaddha iti /
S01kathinau:33_20: pratibhinnenātmodbaddhaḥ / ācaritaṃ ceha yavanaviṣaye / yasya kasyacin niveśane 'tithiḥ kālaṃ lokāntaraṃ karoti /
S01kathinau:33_21: tasya tāvat saṃskāro yāvad rājña āveditaṃ bhavati /
S01kathinau:33_22: tena rājña āveditaṃ / deva madhyadeśāc citrakarācārya ihāgataḥ sa ca mama niveśāne 'vatīrṇas tasya mayā dāruyantrapuṭṭalikāṃ kṛtvā paricārikā preṣitā /
S01kathinau:33_23: sā tena hastena gṛhītvākarṣitā tadā dārusaṃkalikānāṃ puñjo vyavasthitaḥ /
S01kathinau:33_25: taṃ deva pratyavekṣayatu paścād ahaṃ saṃskāraṃ kariṣyāmi /
S01kathinau:33_26: rājāñayā tatrāmātyā gatāḥ / sa tair dṛṣṭaḥ / dṛṣṭvā kathayanti / katham asmākaṃ nāgadantād avatārayitavyaḥ /
S01kathinau:33_27: apare kathayanti / pāśaś chetavyaḥ / tena kuṭhāraṃ gṛhītvā pāśaṃ chettum ārabdhaṃ /
S01kathinau:33_28: yāvac chinnaḥ sa yantrakarācāryaḥ pratibhinnako vyayasthitaḥ /
S01kathinau:33_31: tvaṃ punar mayā sarājikāyāṃ parṣanmadhye pratibhedita iti /
S01kathinau:33_33: yo 'sau citrakarācārya eṣa evāsau śāriputro bhikṣuḥ /
S01kathinau:33_34: yo 'sau yantrakarācārya eṣa evāsau mahāmaudgalyāyano bhikṣuḥ /
S01kathinau:34_2: bhūtapūrvam bhikṣavaḥ / dvayoś citrakarācāryayor vivādo jātaḥ /
S01kathinau:34_3: ekaḥ kathayati / ahaṃ śobhanaṃ śilpaṃ jānāmi /
S01kathinau:34_4: aparaḥ kathayati / ahaṃ śobhanaṃ śilpaṃ jānāmīti /
S01kathinau:34_5: tato vivādād anyonyaṃ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāv upasaṃkramya rājñaḥ sakāśe kathayato 'haṃ śobhanaṃ śilpaṃ jānāmi /
S01kathinau:34_6: aparo 'py ahaṃ śobhanaṃ śilpaṃ jānāmīti kathayati /
S01kathinau:34_8: bhavantau nāhaṃ jāne yo yuṣmākaṃ śilpaṃ jānīte /
S01kathinau:34_9: api tv eka ekāṃ bhitthiṃ parimārjayatu /
S01kathinau:34_10: dvitīyo 'py aparām evaṃ tau madhye yamanikāṃ datvā citrayitum ārabdhau /
S01kathinau:34_13: yena citrakarma kṛtaṃ sa rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S01kathinau:34_14: upasaṃkramya kathayati / deva mama parisamāptaṃ citrakarma /
S01kathinau:34_15: mahārājann avalokayatāṃ / rājāmātyasahāyo nirgataḥ / tad rājñā dṛṣṭaṃ / dṛṣṭvaivaṃ kathayati śobhanam idaṃ citrakarma /
S01kathinau:34_17: chāyā tatra nipatitā / rājā tad dṛṣṭvā kathayati svacchataram idaṃ citrakarmeti /
S01kathinau:34_19: nedaṃ citrakarma / api tu bhittiparikarma / evaṃ rājā vismayam āpannaḥ / amātyān āmantrayate sma / bhavanto 'yaṃ śobhanataraḥ śilpika iti /
S01kathinau:34_24: eṣa evāsau mahāmaudgalyāyano bhikṣus tadāpy eṣa śilpena parājita iti /
S01kathinau:34_25: etarhy apy anena rddhyā parājita iti /
S01kathinau:36_0: kadācid atha śaṅkhena padbhyāṃ apṛṣṭo jaṭaḥ krudhā /
S01kathinau:36_1: likhitaḥ prāha taṃ mūrdhabhedaḥ sūryoyade 'stu te //
S01kathinau:37_1: ity ukte tena suciraṃ sāndhakāram abhūj jagat //
S01kathinau:39_1: likhitaḥ śāriputro 'yaṃ tad vijetā tadāpy abhūt //
S01kathinau:39_2: etarhy apy anena rddhyā parājita ityādi vistarato jñeyaṃ /
S01kathinau:40_1: yāsāṃ dhyānasamāpattīnāṃ lābhī tathāgatas tāsāṃ pratyekabuddhā nāmāpi na jānate /
S01kathinau:40_2: yāsāṃ pratyekabuddhā lābhinas tāsāṃ śāriputro nāmāpi na jānīte /
S01kathinau:40_3: yāsāṃ lābhī śāriputras tāsāṃ maudgalyāyano nāmāpi na jānīte /
